hibernate-mapping.query: select product from com.rssl.phizic.business.dictionaries.pfp.products.complex.ComplexInsuranceProduct as product order by product.account.name asc
select product from com.rssl.phizic.business.dictionaries.pfp.products.complex.ComplexFundInvestmentProduct as product order by product.account.name asc
select product from com.rssl.phizic.business.dictionaries.pfp.products.complex.ComplexIMAInvestmentProduct as product order by product.account.name asc
